data.actual_result: The message interaction menu appears for some recent messages (it seems only messages that were sent today) and causing some issues when trying to use it.
data.expected_result: The message interaction menu shouldn't appear.
data.short_description: Message interaction menu appears for recent messages when using search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and send a message - Open the search and search for the messages sent by yourself - Long press the first search result - Observe that the message menu appears
